name: Jack Razor: Distant Dimension
description:
Inspired by retro European computer games,  Jack Razor: Distant Dimension, has you run, jump, shoot and explore through several levels with locales ranging from forests and caves to factories and airships.

By earning points through collecting items and destroying enemies, you can go to the shop to purchase unlockables and two additional powers- the Flame Dash and the Super Jump! These will allow you to reach new areas and find even more secrets!
